<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_ux_banner_announcement_config</collection> <condition>gs.getProperty('glide.ux.banner_announcement.realtime') == 'true'</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>AMB New or Updated Record</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if ((previous.active == false && current.active == true) || (previous.active == true && current.active == false)) {
var records = { 'current_config_name': current.name, 'current_config_active': current.active, 'previous_config_name': previous.name, 'previous_config_active': previous.active, 'operation': 'config_change', 'current': current.sys_id, 'previous': previous.sys_id }; gs.publish('/uxbannerannouncements', records); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-07-09 18:16:08</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>14c6e17815593010f877da5be2ac0a7a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AMB New or Updated Record</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Banner Announcements - NOW Experiences" source="com.snc.banner_announcements">6807f0283cb1311068bcf327dfe37fac</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_14c6e17815593010f877da5be2ac0a7a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-07 22:32:02</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=14c6e17815593010f877da5be2ac0a7a"/> </record_update>
